# barracudawaf_client_certificate_crls (Resource)

`barracudawaf_client_certificate_crls` manages `Client Certificate Crls` on the Barracuda Web Application Firewall.

## Schema

### Required

- **name** (String) CRL Name
- **parent** (List of String)
- **url** (String) CRL URL
